Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and cut into cubes.
Combine hoisin sauce, sriracha, soy sauce, rice vinegar, and minced garlic in a small bowl.
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add tofu cubes and cook until golden brown and crispy.
Pour the sauce over the tofu and stir to coat.
Serve tofu mixture in lettuce leaves with sliced green onions and sesame seeds (optional).
